author: Staff Reporter
text:
The city police on Sunday arrested three men who tried to sell a country-made pistol. Mohanraj, Sabarai Rajan, and Rajesh Kumar, all residents of the city, were attempting to sell the pistol and ammunitions near Koyambedu. Based on a tip-off, a police team from Organised Crime Investigation wing picked them up near Koyambedu market.

The police said that Mohanraj of Vyasarpadi was being interrogated as he was believed to have some link with notorious gangster C.D. Mani and could be involved in the recent attack on DMK functionary Jagan alias Jaganathan in Saidapet.

The pistol and three rounds of ammunition were seized from them.

It was found that the three were acting on behalf of Aarif, a known offender in Nagapattinam.
title: Three held, country-made pistol seized
